pages.text: $(l)Vault Charms and Trinkets$() are items that give a $(l)player buff$() with restricted uses. Each Vault that is run with the Trinket or Charm $(l)decreases the use by 1$(). $(br2)Trinkets can be found in $(l)Treasure Chests and Reward Crates.$()

A maximum of two can be brought into The Vault, one Trinket (trinkets with the red text and outline) in the $(l)curio slot Trinket$() and one Charm (trinkets with the blue text and outline) in the $(l)curio slot Charm.$() $(br2)Once a trinket is discovered, it can be crafted in the $(l)Vault Forge.$()
